bill.title: Department of Financial Services
bill.description: Revising powers and duties of the department's Division of Investigative and Forensic Services; deleting a requirement for the Department of Children and Families and the community-based care lead agency to provide certain financial literacy curriculum information to certain youth; revising conditions for a nonprofit religious organization to be exempt from requirements of the Florida Insurance Code; adding violations for which the department may pay rewards under the Anti-Fraud Reward Program; authorizing the Division of State Fire Marshal to establish a direct-support organization; specifying requirements and procedures for the licensure of nonresident sales representatives for home warranty associations, etc.
